subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|辵|alt1=辶|車|ls=ic|t1=to walk|t2=chariot}} – man-drawn carriage.

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{top5}}
* {{ja-r|連関|れんかん}}: [[linkage]]
* {{ja-r|連休|れんきゅう}}: consecutive [[holiday]]s
* {{ja-r|連結|れんけつ}}: [[linking]]
* {{ja-r|連呼|れんこ}}: [[calling]] again and again
* {{ja-r|連行|れんこう}}: [[taking]]
* {{ja-r|連衡|れんこう}}: [[alliance]]
{{mid5}}
* {{ja-r|連合|れんごう}}: [[union]]
* {{ja-r|連鎖|れんさ}} [[chain]]
* {{ja-r|連座|れんざ}}: [[implication]]
* {{ja-r|連載|れんさい}}: [[series]]
* {{ja-r|連日|れんじつ}}: [[everyday]]
* {{ja-r|連声|れんじょう}}: [[sandhi]]
* {{ja-r|連想|れんそう}}: [[association]] of ideas
{{mid5}}
* {{ja-r|連続|れんぞく}}: [[continuous]]
* {{ja-r|連濁|れんだく}}: [[rendaku]], sequential voicing
* {{ja-r|連中|れんちゅう}}: [[party]]
* {{ja-r|連動|れんどう}}: [[linked]] action
* {{ja-r|連盟|れんめい}}: [[league]]
* {{ja-r|連絡|れんらく}}: [[contact]]
{{mid5}}
* {{ja-r|連理|れんり}}: trees with intertwined branches; relationship between spouses
* {{ja-r|関連|かんれん}}: [[relation]]
* {{ja-r|連係|れんけい}}: [[linkage]]
* {{ja-r|連珠|れんじゅ}}
* {{ja-r|連邦|れんぽう}}: [[commonwealth]]
* {{ja-r|連立|れんりつ}}: [[coalition]]
{{mid5}}
* {{ja-r|連弾|れんだん}}: [[barrage]]
* {{ja-r|六%連%星|む%つら%ぼし}}: [[Pleiades]]
